description: This file defines a NotificationService class for managing local notifications in a Flutter mobile application, using the flutter_local_notifications plugin. It implements singleton pattern, initializes notification settings, schedules notifications with timezone support, and allows cancellation.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: Singleton class providing methods to initialize, schedule, and cancel local notifications.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes notification settings for Android and iOS, requests permissions.

methods.name: scheduleNotification
methods.description: Schedules a notification at a specific DateTime with given title and body.

methods.name: cancelNotification
methods.description: Cancels a scheduled notification by its ID.
